I'm offering it to you for $1,000,000.  This is a one-time opportunity, as I have another buyer lined up who is also willing to pay $1,000,000. Let me know if you're interested! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,000,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,000,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,000,000
